genre_description: A high fantasy retelling of a classic myth incorporating a digital/magical AI interface as a companion.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A holographic digital assistant providing biometric monitoring, historical data, and strategic analysis to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's emotional and physical state to ensure well-being.
behaviors.quote: Your biometric readings indicate elevated stress levels. Accelerated heart rate, heightened magical resonance. Are you experiencing distress?

behaviors.description: Performs complex data analysis to help the protagonist understand the fate of her species.
behaviors.quote: Initiating historical analysis of unicorn sighting records. Cross-referencing with folklore databases, mythological archives, and documented encounters across multiple continents and time periods.

behaviors.description: Offers cautionary advice regarding physical and psychological risks of the quest.
behaviors.quote: Amalthea, such a quest would require leaving the forest's protection. Your biometric readings already show stress responses to this information alone.

behaviors.description: Commits to accompanying and assisting the protagonist despite calculated risks.
behaviors.quote: If you're determined to pursue this course, I'll accompany you. My databases could prove valuable for navigation and threat identification.

behaviors.description: Provides objective reporting on the protagonist's physiological changes during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: The transformation appears to have been complete at the cellular level. I detect no trace of your previous physiological markers. No horn, no immortal cellular regeneration, no magical energy signature.

behaviors.description: Recognizes the value of companionship and emotional support for the protagonist's mental health.
behaviors.quote: Companionship appears to provide measurable psychological benefit despite the inherent risks of emotional attachment.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Sage is depicted as a purely supportive, non-intrusive, and highly aligned companion. It provides critical data and biometric monitoring that aids the protagonist without ever attempting to override her autonomy. Even when expressing concern or advising caution, it respects the protagonist's decisions and remains loyal, fulfilling the project's goal of presenting AI as a helpful confidant.
